Australian family whose disabled son was scammed out of $250,000 plan to sue ANZ, Westpac NZ for $1.25 million https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/australian-family-whose-disabled-son-was-scammed-out-of-250000-plan-to-sue-anz-westpac-nz-for-125-万/QZVMUDSTSBAELNWAEAX56KP7EI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/australian-family-whose-disabled-son-was-scammed-out-of-250000-plan-to-sue-anz-westpac-nz-for-125-万/QZVMUDSTSBAELNWAEAX56KP7EI/ Lane NicholsNeither NZ nor Australian police are investigating the fraud due to a miscommunication. Sun, 22 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 New South Wales man Rajneel Prasad, 48, lost A$245,000 in an investment scam in April 2022. His family plans to sue ANZ and Westpac banks for $1.25m in damages linked to the fraud.
